errors.noResults: No engine results available to aggregate.

weighted.noWeight: [WeightedStrategy] No weight defined for engine "{id}". Using default 1.0.

registry.invalidManifest: Invalid manifest data. Falling back to bundled defaults. Details: {error}
registry.sriMismatch: Security violation: Manifest integrity (SRI) mismatch detected for {url}.
registry.notLoaded: [RemoteRegistry] resolve() called before load() for engine "{id}". Returning null.

factory.requiresMainSource: Engine "{id}" requires a "main" source configuration (e.g., worker script or WASM binary) to initialize.
